column1: Just received this info from Xanterra:yellowstonenationalparklodges.com/coronavirusSad but certainly understandable.
This is on the Wyoming forum as well. Not unexpected, and a bit optimistic, but maybe we will all be lucky and they will be able to open then!
Well...I hope that doesn't extend in length or parks but I think it will do both. I'm getting really good at cancelling and rebooking my next attempt. dave
